alert.note: Alert for Darlington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Darlington County through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elliott, or near Bishopville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hartsville, Darlington, Lamar, North Hartsville, Dovesville, Lydia, Darlington Raceway, Auburn, Swift Creek, Clyde, Oats, Floyd, Kellytown, Society Hill, and Carolina Pines Regional Medical Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 126 and 136. Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
